titleStmt.title: Five seasonable sermons. As they were preached before eminent auditories, upon several arguments. / By Paul Knell Master in Arts, of Clare-Hall in Cambridge. Sometimes chaplain to a regiment of curiasiers in His late Majesties Army.
titleStmt.author: Knell, Paul, 1615?-1664.
Knell, Paul, 1615?-1664. Israel and England paralelled.
Knell, Paul, 1615?-1664. Looking-glasse for Levellers.

notesStmt.note: "The convoy of a Christian", "The assumption of the Messiah", "Israel and England paralelled", "A looking-glasse for Levellers", and "A severe sentence against secure citizens" have separate dated title pages; register and pagination are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
